segments.text: I can't believe it ! I lost .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It looks like you have to buy tickets for us , Jason . And we're not going to see an action movie !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's not fair , you got all the easy questions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess that's just the luck of the draw .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want a rematch . Let's play again .
segments.speaker: S1
